## GitHub Account

<hr>

Version control is a system that records changes to a file or set of files so
that you can recall specific versions later. It allows us to:

- create backups
- track every individual change made
- track who made the changes
- work collaboratively
- prevent concurrent work from conflicting

## Install Git

<hr>

So what is Git? It is

- a distributed version control system
- free
- open source
- easy to learn
- flexible
- secure

## Configure Git

<hr>

GitHub acts as a remote host for your Git managed projects. It

- allows others to see your work
- suggest changes
- collaborate
- has a well designed web interface
